column1: Please do not change the template headings.
First data column must be blank.
If you are uploading new records, leave the "name" (ID) column blank.
If you are uploading new records, "Naming Series" becomes mandatory, if present.
Only mandatory fields are necessary for new records. You can delete non-mandatory columns if you wish.
For updating, you can update only selective columns.
You can only upload upto 5000 records in one go. (may be less in some cases)
Start entering data below this line

column11:
Executive Search

  • Head Hunting for Senior Management Positions
  • Led by Specialist Executive Search consultants
  • HumanCapita will charge a recruitment fee based on the yearly fixed remuneration of the candidates.

HumanCapita Pte Ltd is a premier Recruitment agency headquartered in Singapore. HumanCapita provides the full spectrum of recruitment services for all type of industries and we specialize in providing the best suitable candidates for both permanent and contractual positions.

We recognize the rapid changing demands for the highly qualified professionals and we offer an exceptional service in limited time frames to meet our customer needs. Our qualified executive team will monitor the current trends in the job market and will work with our clients to fulfill all their manpower requirements and to provide the best one stop HR solutions. Through our large pool of data base, we guarantee ready availability of ideal professionals for every position of our specialty sectors. Everything from the planning to the interview, leading to selection, and reference check, right up to their joining and performance is our responsibility.

We understand that how crucial it is to have prompt provision of effective, efficient and specialized personnel for all sectors. It has come to focus its resources and proficiency towards the following listed sectors, which required best human resource solutions in a manner most professional and timely.

  • IT and Telecom
  • Banking
  • Marine
  • Marketing
  • Oil and Gas
  • Pharmaceutical
  • Engineering
  • Construction
  • Hospitality

Our executive team includes Industry experts from Human resource management who are highly qualified and experienced in deploying and managing 1000 over employees in APAC majority in Singapore, along with professionals from International Marketing. We are a reliable company in your urgent Human resource needs.

Project Management Recruitment

  • If you have required multiple resource for a specific project
  • This service offers flexible and fastest full phase project support
  • HumanCapita will charge depend on the services used (Case by case)

Contracting Recruitment

  • For project based / temporarily positions
  • Candidates payroll will be under HumanCapita
  • HumanCapita will charge a fee per worked hour, day or Month

Permanent Recruitment

  • For permanent positions
  • We will refer the most suitable candidates for the position
  • HumanCapita will charge a recruitment fee based on the fixed remuneration of the candidates
